[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@loopback/core](./core.md) &gt; [CoreTags](./core.coretags.md) &gt; [EXTENSION\_FOR](./core.coretags.extension_for.md)

## CoreTags.EXTENSION\_FOR variable

Binding tag for extensions to specify name of the extension point that an extension contributes to.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
EXTENSION_FOR = "extensionFor"
```
